attributes.action: Refund university students half of their tuition fee. Due to COVID 19.
attributes.additional_details: All students, specifically students who require face to face teaching have been given a raw deal. Being forced online, having only a minimal amount of time on zoom/ teams etc. With tutors has affected not just the mental health of students, but also the education. Many students have worked ferociously to make it into their university of choice, for it to only be thrown back into their faces with sub-par teaching.
attributes.background: I believe the government should refund half, or at least 25% of the tuition fee for university students who have been forced online. Failing that be given freedom of an extra year of student finance allowing to retake 2 years.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
